thread.title: The 2nd World Internet Conference to be held in Chinese Water-town Wuzhen
thread.title_full: The 2nd World Internet Conference to be held in Chinese Water-town Wuzhen - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The 2nd World Internet Conference to be held in Chinese Water-town Wuzhen
text:
Wuzhen Tourism Co., Ltd.
WUZHEN, China , Sept. 22, The 2 nd World Internet Conference, a large scale and high-level summit in the Internet industry, will be held in Wuzhen in October 2015 . It advocates global communities to respect individual differences and build a consensus that people should share opportunities brought about by the cyber era.
Since becoming the permanent home of the World Internet Conference in 2014, Wuzhen has been committed to boosting its capability in terms of updating facilities , rais ing service quality and improving security to offer a better conference experience to visitors . Wuzhen has now become a unique tourist attraction that combines business conference opportunities with entertaining cultural landscapes.
To offer a warm welcome to attendees from all over the world, Wuzhen has set up four pavilions, seven resorts, 50 hostels and various business hotels. The main conference hall in the West Scenic Zone, Waterside Resort, with a total construction area of approximately 485,000 square feet, has 13 independent conference rooms with simultaneous interpretation facilities and 350 deluxe traditional Chinese style rooms, while r ecreational facilities such as a swimming pool and gym allow attendees to relax during their down time.
For conventioneers who want to experience the culture and folk customs, living in hostel is an ideal choice. Visitors will be able to attend the world-class conference while at the same time discove ring everyday Chinese traditions . Due to the large amount and diversity of guests , Wuzhen has implemented special measures to ensure service quality, including offering local landlords training on how to better receive guests from around the world.
Besides conference facilities and accommodatio n , Wuzhen will also offer 800 additional parking spaces and 1,000 additional Wi-Fi points in order to cope with the increased visitor numbers and guarantee easily accessible Internet throughout the town.
"We will provide a high level venue and customized services ," said Yao Jie , general manager of sales department, Wuzhen Tourism Co., Ltd . "Visitors will not only enjoy their working environment but also have the opportunity to experience the unique Chinese culture."
For more information, please visit: http://www.wicwuzhen.cn/english/
About the World Internet Conference
The World Internet Conference invites over 1,200 leading figures from governments, international organizations, enterprises, technology communities and CSOs every year. The conference generates a comprehensive discussion around Internet security, Internet sustainability, Internet intellectual property protection and technological innovation .
About Wuzhen
Wuzhen is a traditional ancient Chinese water town one-hour's drive from Shanghai . With 1,300 years of history, Wuzhen combines more than 10 cultural landscapes including folk museums and celebrity residences with contemporary art elements and modern resort facilities to offer visitors an unparalleled leisure experience.
